Agency: New Hampshire Bureau of Securities Regulation

Company: Berthel Fisher & Company Financial Services, Inc.
Description: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority fined Berthel Fisher & Company Financial Services, Inc. and its affiliate, Securities Management & Research, Inc., of Marion, Iowa, a combined $775,000 for supervisory deficiencies, including Berthel Fisher's failure to supervise the sale of non-traded real estate investment trusts (REITs), and leveraged and inverse exchange-traded funds (ETFs).
Notes: FINRA is a securities industry self-regulatory body authorized by the federal government.
